product_name: The North Face NSE Booties - Infant Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The North Face NSE infant booties keep little feet safe and warm in a cocoon of coziness, keeping your infant ready for fun even in cold weather. Lightweight Heatseeker(TM) synthetic insulation keeps little toes warm; fleece uppers and lining add warmth and feel soft against skin. Higher cuff provides additional coverage; rip-and-stick closures on both sides of the shoes ease on-and-off transitions. Synthetic bottoms on the North Face NSE booties are soft and flexible, allowing room for fast-growing feet; nonskid applique on outsoles helps provide grip. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face NSE infant booties keep little feet safe and warm in a cocoon of coziness, keeping your infant ready for fun even in cold weather.
